scripts.set_bridge:arbitrum_goerli:bayc: npx hardhat set_bridge --onft MockOBoredApeYachtClub --target goerli --network arbitrum_goerli
scripts.set_bridge:goerli:bayc: npx hardhat set_bridge --onft MockOBoredApeYachtClub --target arbitrum_goerli --network goerli
scripts.deploy:dev:bayc: npm run deploy:arbitrum_goerli&&npm run deploy:goerli&&npm run set_bridge:arbitrum_goerli:bayc&&npm run set_bridge:goerli:bayc
scripts.set_bridge:arbitrum_prod:ghost: npx hardhat set_bridge --onft prod_GHOST --target mainnet_prod --network arbitrum_prod
scripts.set_bridge:mainnet_prod:ghost: npx hardhat set_bridge --onft prod_GHOST --target arbitrum_prod --network mainnet_prod
scripts.deploy:prod:ghost: npm run deploy:mainnet_prod:ghost&&npm run deploy:arbitrum_prod:ghost&&npm run set_bridge:arbitrum_prod:ghost&&npm run set_bridge:mainnet_prod:ghost
scripts.verify:sepolia:basic: npx hardhat verify --network sepolia 0xa194148BB9C5670d6dE243049801AAa2cAb26224&&npx hardhat verify --network sepolia 0x507b685191023954F50F1ca707fA6D54BE79e43C&&npx hardhat verify --network sepolia 0x98802A2C4930C01BA5cB09bd6FF65e6b58AA3Cd0
